Reign: Joint reign of Hatshepsut and Thutmose III
Geography: Country of Origin Egypt, Upper Egypt; Thebes, Deir el-Bahri
Provenance: Formerly in the collection of the Reverend Chauncey Murch (died 1907). Collected between 1883 and 1906 while Murch was a missionary in Egypt. Collection purchased by the Museum from the Murch family with funds provided by Helen Miller Gould, 1910.
